title: disconnects
body: Game keeps disconnecting, even just sitting in the lobby the chat room disconnects. Happens in games i have lost 4 or 5 cause i have dc 10 times or mid fight. anyone else experiencing this.

replies.body: i hate tried it and nothing im still getting diconnected non stop and only in ranked. it has cost me silver and i went down to bronze 4 cause of it. The climb is already impossible due to teams. I just played a game as ww jungle was 4/0 6 min in then dc till my mid lane was gone. i Played a game as eve and went 27/5 and still lost cause of my team. I can not climb out of bronze with these discconects if i have to rely on my team who will feed 11 kills in 10 min. what do i do and how do i get my rank back i just want to be in silver and out of this bronze crap so i can start climbing to my actual place.

I looked at our records and I don't see any NA server issues recorded lately, so it doesn't look like something from our end. I've seen this happen most frequently due to certain network settings that cause a *poor connection* to our server. I recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common causes for this.

Let me know if this fixed the issue for you!
